Invocation Name: nature remo
des:
Nature Remo skill allows you to control home appliances with Alexa using the Nature Remo series devices (Note 1), and to check electricity consumption and electricity bills with Alexa using the Nature Remo E series devices.

If you have a Nature Remo series device, the following operations are available with this skill:
- TV: Power (ON/OFF), channel change, digital TV/BS/CS switching, volume change, AV operation
- Air conditioner: Power (ON/OFF), temperature change, mode change (cooling, heating, dehumidification, auto, air), swing
- Lighting: Power (ON/OFF), brightness change (Note 2), night light
- Other home appliances: Power (ON/OFF)
- Scene: Execution

If you have a Nature Remo E series device, the following operations are available with this skill:
- Graphical display of smart meter power consumption (compatible with Echo Show series (Note 3))
- Reading out smart meter power consumption and electricity bills by voice

To use this skill, you need to purchase a device from the Nature Remo series or Nature Remo E series, download the app, and create a Nature Remo account with your email address.
Also, please enable this skill in a state where home appliance operation from Nature Remo and access to the smart meter from Nature Remo E are possible in advance.
When enabling the skill, please enter the email address currently in use in the Nature Remo app.

If you have any questions, please check our official help center.
https://support.nature.global/hc/en

Note 1: The Nature Remo series refers to Nature Remo 3, Nature Remo mini 2, Nature Remo mini 2 Premium, Nature Remo nano, Nature Remo mini, Nature Remo 2, and Nature Remo. The Nature Remo E series refers to Nature Remo E and Nature Remo E lite.

Note 2: While absolute brightness values cannot be specified, it is possible to specify relative brightness (brighter, darker). We provide features according to the remote control of the device being operated. Even when changing the brightness of the lighting via Alexa, the behavior provided may vary depending on the remote control of your device.

Note 3: The Echo Show series is compatible with Echo Show (1st and 2nd Gen), Echo Show 5, Echo Show 8, Echo Show 10, Echo Show 15, and Fire TV.
